title: South Jersey man accused of murder arrested in Georgia
title_page: South Jersey man accused of murder arrested in Georgia
maintext:
By Staff
A 22-year-old Pleasantville man charged with fatally shooting a 19-year-old neighbor, and later kidnapping a witness to the shooting, was arrested in Georgia this week, officials said Thursday.
Hassan Montague-Reed, of Pleasantville, was arrested in Cobbs County earlier this week on unrelated charges, and is being held by the county sheriffâ€™s department pending extradition back to New Jersey, according to Atlantic County Prosecutor Diane M. Ruberton.
Continue reading on Philly.com
http://www.philly.com/philly/blogs/real-time/South-Jersey-man-accused-of-murder-arrested-in-Georgia.html
